C

captureOppositeStones() - Method in class com.shikhardev.mancala.services.BoardServiceTest
 
captureOppositeStones(Player, Pit) - Method in class com.shikhardev.mancala.services.BoardService
While moving, if the move ends on a pit with 0 stones, the current player captures the stones of the opposite side.
collectRemainingStones() - Method in class com.shikhardev.mancala.services.BoardService
If the game has ended, at least one side of the board is empty.
